item.title: Hamburger dressing
item.description: A delicious home made hamburger dressing üçî ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 1 min üç≥ Cook time: 1 min Ingredients 3 tbsp mayonnese or aioli 2 tbsp ketchup 1 tbsp sriracha 1 clove garlic, if using mayonnese and not aioli (optional) Directions Mix ingredients in a bowl Contribution brox - xmr: 8AaUvC4JPfTVgy66FLd8mVfsPwT7RXJuPK2xySoKnFEhDZPNafpgn6rh8VPBVauyNP17EQQ1HGhMCZdtUJNoD7xnVt1cSLo
